text: Kist sitamgortar az on, ki ojoti Parvardigoraşro ʙarojaş ʙixonand, pas ū ʙa'di fahmidan rūj gardonad va korhoi ʙade, ki az peş karda, faromūş kunad? Hamono Mo ʙar dili onho parda afkandem, to ojoti Qur'onro nafahmand va gūşhojaşonro kar soxtem, to onro naşunavand. Agar da'vat kunī kofironro ʙa sūji hidojat, hargiz roh najoʙand
